titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate relating to the commemoration of the 190th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and the Kingdom of Thailand.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate relating to the commemoration of the 190th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and the Kingdom of Thailand.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the 190th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and Thailand. It also expresses the hope of enhancing the ties of friendship between the peoples of the United States and Thailand.
